articles.title: Concerned mom warns about Ring surveillance cameras after hacker taunted daughter
articles.description: A Mississippi mom is sending a warning to parents everywhere after someone hacked her Ring surveillance cameras in her daughter’s bedroom and talked to her.
articles.content:
A Mississippi mom is warning parents everywhere after someone hacked her Ring surveillance cameras in her daughter’s bedroom and talked to her.

articles.author: Paulina Dedaj
articles.title: PGA officials dismiss Patrick Reed's caddie following shoving 'incident' with Australian spectator
articles.description: American Patrick Reed will have to look for another caddie for the final session of the Presidents Cup in Melbourne Sunday after his got into a physical altercation with a fan after the previous day’s match and was subsequently dismissed by officials.
articles.content: American Patrick Reed will have to look for another caddie for the final session of the Presidents Cup in Melbourne Sunday after his initial bag man got into a physical altercation with a fan after the previous day’s match and was subsequently dismissed by of… [+2477 chars]

articles.title: Bank accidentally deposits $37M into Texas woman's account
articles.description: A Texas woman experienced a brief Christmas miracle after a clerical error by her bank accidentally made her a multi-millionaire for a day.
articles.content:
A North Texas woman experienced a brief Christmas miracle earlier this week after a clerical error by her bank accidentally made her a multi-millionaire for a day.

articles.title: Shaquille O'Neal jokes that Stevie Wonder isn't really blind after elevator encounter
articles.description: Shaquille O'Neal isn't convinced that Stevie Wonder is blind after a funny encounter in an elevator.
articles.content:
Shaquille O'Neal isn't convinced that Stevie Wonder is blind after a funny encounter in an elevator.
The NBA legend, 47, was co-hosting "Inside The NBA" on Thursday night when he told a quick story that he promised, "you're not gonna believe."

articles.title: UN Human Rights Office accused of helping China keep an eye on dissidents
articles.content:
EXCLUSIVE - A United Nations whistleblower is accusing the organization's human rights office in Switzerland of continuing to provide the Chinese government with the names of activists critical of Beijing.

articles.title: Marine deserter sought in Virginia murder hid in camper as investigators tore it apart: report
articles.description: Virginia investigators tore apart a camper without finding a fugitive Marine murder suspect who was hiding inside, according to a report.
articles.content:
